subject: GREETINGS;Wendi
body:
GREETINGS;Wendi

My name is CHIMEZIE John Madueke, I got your contact from the chamber of 
commerce as an accredited Construction investor

My mother, Mrs. Dieziani Alison-Madueke was the former Minister of 
Petroleum from April 2010 - 28 May 2015 Under the Administration of the 
former President of Nigeria, Mr. Goodluck Ebele Johnathan.

During my mother tenure in office, she was able to acquire millions of 
dollars through deals done with several multinational oil corporations 
using her office as the Minister of Petroleum

A lot of these funds were invested and deposited in several offshore 
accounts several in Africa, Europe and Middle East.

One of such investments is the acquisition of Gold mines and bullion in 
excess Five million dollars ($5,000,000.00) in the Republic of South 
Africa and Europe.

As you can see from the current trend of events and change of Government 
in Nigeria, the present administration and wicked enemies of my mother 
is witch-hunting and accusing her of bribery and corruption. She stands 
to loose it all if care is not taken. All that we have suffered for. I 
reject it and will not stand by and watch this happen!

Currently, my hard working mother is ill with cancer and battling for 
her dear life in a London hospital. As if this is not enough suffering 
already, the British National Crime Agency has arrested her for 
questioning on these corruption charges.

So read the news below:

http://www.vanguardngr.com/2015/10/diezani-alison-madueke-arrested-in-london/

I will want you to help me secure my mothers properties (fund) so that 
we can invest it into your construction firm. Can you assist me? You 
will be greatly rewarded. I believe we can do business together...

Please reply if you think you can be of assistance and we can establish 
communication

My best wishes,

CHIMEZIE John Madueke

subject: Re: GREETINGS;Wendi
body:
Hello CHIMEZIE John Madueke,

I'm sorry to hear about your mother's situation. It sounds like a very difficult time for you and your family. I hope she gets better soon.

As for your proposal, it's quite intriguing! I've never been involved in anything like this before. Could you please provide more details? For instance, how exactly would I be able to assist you? And what kind of investment are we talking about?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Wendi

subject: Re: GREETINGS;Wendi
body:
ATTENTION:Wendi

Thanks for your expressed interest in my mothers properties investment 
business proposal. We got your information from our chambers of 
commerce.

However, I am obliged to inform you that every document needed to carry 
out this transaction including the investment contract agreement will be 
made available to you for you to sign and send a copy back to us. I want 
you to
know that this is the only money left with our family, all other money 
has been ceased by the new wicked Nigeria president who does not have 
human feelings, The* $5million* is now in Europe without nobody knows 
and It was secured with a security volt, I must assure you that this 
transaction is more than 100% risk free which you will never regret 
doing business with our family in your life.

My mother, MRS. DIEZANI ALISON MADUEKE is seriously sick and she is in 
the sick bed in London and we do not really know if she can survive it 
and this is her instruction, we want this money to be invested in your 
company or any of your  choice  for 10 years, for us to proceed, i would 
like you to send us your *company address*, your *full name* and your* 
direct mobile* WhatsApp*number* where you can be reach at any time, as 
soon as we receive all this information from you; we will forward it to 
our representative who knows everything about this fund and whom we are 
fronting to change all the documentation to your name as the rightful 
investor of this fund.

However, this money is under their custody covered with their diplomatic 
immunity. They will approve it, to enable you to receive the money to 
any account of your choice where you want the money to be transferred. 
Attached is my international passport and my mother's passport / her 
picture in the Hospital as well. The *30% *which will be given to you 
will be on the agreement that we will send to you for you to sign by 
yourself while the *70%* will be invested in your country as soon as I 
hear from you.

At this time, it is very important that we communicate regularly via 
WhatsApp phone and call, so that my mother will be happy; this Fund 
($5Million) is the only hope for my family's future; and we entrust the 
whole money into your hands, so you can receive it, and make good 
investments with the money.

I am expecting your reply as soon as possible
REGARDS

John Chimezie Madueke

subject: Re: GREETINGS;Wendi
body:
Hello John Chimezie Madueke,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this information with me. I'm sorry to hear about your mother's health condition, it must be a tough time for your family.

I appreciate the trust you're placing in me regarding this investment opportunity. However, I would like to understand more about the nature of the investment and how it works. Could you please provide more details? 

Also, could you explain what role your lawyer plays in this process? And how does the diplomatic immunity come into play?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Wendi

subject: Re: GREETINGS;Wendi
body:
Attn;Wendi

Thank you for your email,as i said all the arrangement has been done on 
how to transfer this money to you after the documentation change to your 
name as the investor that want to invest this money for our family The 
lawyer will change all the document to your name and summit it to the 
security company in Spain and follow up to make sure the money is being 
released to you ,the security company has  the diplomatic immunity to 
protect the money and release the money to you after the documentation 
,as soon as you receive the money you can invest it to any business of 
your choice as soon i receive your information's i will send you the 
certificate of deposit which my use  to deposit the money to the 
security company in Spain so send me your information's for the lawyer 
to start work
REGARDS

John Chimezie Madueke

subject: Re: GREETINGS;Wendi
body:
Hello John Chimezie Madueke,

Thank you for your detailed explanation. It sounds like a well-thought-out plan. I'm curious, how did you come up with this idea? And why did you choose Spain as the location for the security company?

I must say, I'm quite interested in learning more about this investment opportunity. However, I would like to understand better how the process works before we proceed further.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Wendi

subject: Re: GREETINGS;Wendi
body:
Attn;Wendi

Thank you for your email,as i said My mother, Mrs. Dieziani 
Alison-Madueke was the former Minister of Petroleum from April 2010 - 28 
May 2015 Under the Administration of the former President of Nigeria, 
Mr. Goodluck Ebele Johnathan

During my mother tenure in office, she was able to acquire millions of 
dollars through deals done with several multinational oil corporations 
using her office as the Minister of Petroleum,A lot of these funds were 
invested and deposited in several offshore accounts which than she knows 
the best security company that is secured because of her position than
REGARDS

John Chimezie Madueke

subject: Re: GREETINGS;Wendi
body:
Hello John Chimezie Madueke,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. It's quite interesting to hear about your mother's tenure as the Minister of Petroleum. She must have had a lot of responsibilities and challenges in her role.

You mentioned that she was able to acquire millions of dollars through deals with several oil companies. Could you tell me more about these deals? What kind of investments did she make with these funds?

Also, you mentioned something about offshore accounts and a secure security company. Could you elaborate on that? I'm curious to know how such things work.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Wendi

subject: Re: GREETINGS;Wendi
body:
Attn;Wendi

Thank you for your email,Please send me your Whats App Number let me 
call for us to talk is better so that you can understand very well so 
send me your Whats App Number
REGARDS

John Chimezie Madueke

subject: Re: GREETINGS;Wendi
body:
Hello John Chimezie Madueke,

Thank you for your quick response. I'm really excited to continue our conversation, but I'm not comfortable sharing my WhatsApp number at this time. However, we can definitely keep the conversation going here.

Could you please elaborate more on what you wanted me to understand better? I'm all ears and ready to learn!

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Wendi
